General.Name: Vitality Products Inc
General.Description: Vitality Products Inc. manufactures, markets, and distributes natural health products in Canada and the United States. It offers vitamins, minerals, and nutritional supplements. The company provides its products through retailers, distributors, and in-store, as well as online. Vitality Products Inc. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 837 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3N6

1.Name: Mr. W. Douglas Grant C.M.A., CPA, CPA, M.B.A.
